https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yioyGJmSMfJyVz05fNbSJuWJMiq.jpg Jean-FrancÌ§ois Pignon, a renowned wild horses trainer, sets himself a new challenge : to tame four horses in their natural habitat, in the famous french singer Florent Pagny's campo. During these 40 days of an initiatory trip in Patagonia, he will use his knowledge and patience. Little by little, magic happens... 40 jours, 4 criollos et du silence
